*Infectra listened and listened and listened* Infectra: I guess there is al=
ot when it comes to Computers.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THEC=
ODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, June 30, 2000 5:46 AM
  Subj=
ect: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  "Umm, all of the rest, but watch out for what A=
rrow, Blender, and Srronghold say, they aren't very normal." Stranato said.=


  "My turn!" Train Wreck said. Very slowly, at a very slow pace, Train Wr=
eck told Infectra alot about computers, that is too complicated to post her=
e, he also told her about how the computers can do spark scans to find near=
by bots...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
   =
 To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, June 30, 2000 5:39 AM
    Subjec=
t: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    Infectra: Sounds interesting. I got that. I hav=
e good memory...I hope! *Infectra said joking* Infectra: Who else is going =
to teach me something?
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: THEC=
ODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, June 30, 2000 5:33 A=
M
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      Okay, first it's Stranato's tur=
n, he'll show you combat and stuff." Train Wreck said. The others nodded an=
d walked back into the base. Stranato turned to Infectra.

      "So, first=
 of all, if someone fires at you, use something for ptotection, you can gra=
b a rock or something, because around here, lots of powerful weapons are us=
ed, stay away from Heavy Blaster Rifles if your not the one holding them! O=
kay, watch this." Stranato said. He propped a dummy up on his back. He swun=
g his foot backwards and kicked the dummy in the groin. Stranato then hit a=
 belly to belly suplex on the dummy.

      "Now, if something happens, lik=
e you getting into a bunch of trouble, play dead, they come close, bam! You=
 blow their guts out!" Stranato said. Stranato fired his eye beams into the=
 sky. Stranato did a moonsault from the top of a rock.

      "Never forget=
 to surprise your opponent!" Stranato said.

      "Oh, yeah, don't argue w=
ith the leaders, they get mad, and all the bases have autoguns and shields,=
 watch out for them." Stranato said. Stranato hopped onto a rock.

      "P=
ick your weapons carefully, and never let your guard down, your best friend=
s could be your enemy!" Stranato said.

      "Protect the Ark, yeah, I kno=
w, we don't fight for any reasons but our own, but if the Autobots get dest=
royed, you cease to exist! Oh, yeah, kick ass and win Olympic Gold!" Strana=
to said. Stranato nodded and laughed...
        ----- Original Message ----=
- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        S=
ent: Friday, June 30, 2000 5:21 AM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  =
      *Infectra stands up and follows the Radicons* Infectra: I want you to=
 show everything importent. Every detail please. *Infectra says to the Radi=
cons*
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
    =
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Friday, June 30, 2000 4:39 AM=

          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          "Okay, Airbomber will te=
ach you about some stuff first." Train Wreck said.

          "Okay, we are=
 on the planet Earth, we are with the Maximlas, and we are trying to destro=
y the Predacons and Alliance, but however, right now we are at truce, so ou=
r enemies are the Newcomers right now." Airbomber said.

          "Yeah, A=
irbomber got it right, stupid truce. Well, anyway, to be successful in the =
Neo Beast Wars, you have to know the fine arts, come outside and let us sho=
w you." Stranato said. The Radicons walked out the door, motioning for Infe=
ctra to come along...
            ----- Original Message ----- 
           =
 From: ilovealllizards 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sen=
t: Friday, June 30, 2000 4:09 AM
            Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


=
            *Infectra looked at them all* Infectra: What's so horrid about =
this place? You must teach me, please. *Infectra sits up and looks at them =
waiting for some tips*
              ----- Original Message ----- 
        =
      From: THECODE 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Se=
nt: Thursday, June 29, 2000 11:17 PM
              Subject: Re: Neo Beast W=
ars


              Train Wreck looks at her.

              "Amnesia? Well=
, it sounds to me like when we got out spark shipment from our deathmatches=
, somebody ripped out your spark and snuck it in, somebody must have hated =
you alot, but don't worry, yuor safe with us now." Train Wreck said.

     =
         "Be careful, I tried to kill a guy." Stranato said.

             =
 "Stranato, don't worry about it!" Airbomber said.

              "It seems=
 you don't know about the war, you were peaceful on Cybertron, so lets teac=
h you what to do to stay alive on this horrid planet." Train Wreck said.

 =
             "Yeah, first of all, ya gotta drink this stuff!" Stronghold sa=
id to Infectra, taking a big gulp of beer.

              "Yeah, and you sm=
oke these!" Blender said, smoking a cigar. Train Wreck walked up and slappe=
d them both in the back of the head.

              "I can help, I love to =
help!" Airbomber said. Arrow walks over and smokes a cigar, blowing some sm=
oke in Infectra's face. Train Wreck comes up behind Arrow and taps his shou=
lder. Arrow turns around and Train Wreck slaps him in the face.

          =
    "Please excuse those 3 ignoramuses, they don't know any better." Train =
Wreck said to Infectra...
                ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
             From: ilovealllizards 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com =

                Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 11:05 PM
                Sub=
ject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                *The Bots optics open and she lo=
oks around* Infectra:...where am I????.......the last thing I remember I wa=
s seeing my friedns go plunging to the floor and then this large bot sends =
this claw out at me....but......that's all I remember..... *She says to par=
ticular bot*
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
              =
    From: THECODE 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              =
    Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 10:50 PM
                  Subject: Re: N=
eo Beast Wars


                  OCC: I talked to Orchid and she said she =
wanted a new character to be made from Drazom, but she didn't want it to be=
 anything like Drazom.
                   
                  Train Wreck wo=
rks on Drazom. He looks at all of the sparks they had in storage.

        =
          "Now how did this one get in here? This spark was never in a deat=
hmatch!" Train Wreck said.

                  "So how did it get in there?"=
 Stranato asked. Train Wreck shrugged. He took the spark, curious to find o=
ut who it is, he put it in the former body of Drazom, which was remade into=
 whatever Orchid wants it to be, whatever, it looks nothing like Drazom. Tr=
ain Wreck and the rest of the Radicons wait for the robot to come to life..=
.
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
                    Fro=
m: ilovealllizards 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
           =
         Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 10:21 PM
                    Subject=
: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                    (OOC: I want to bring in a new c=
haracter. I already have an idea..)
                      ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
                      From: THECODE 
                      To:=
 nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                      Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 9:=
08 PM
                      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                 =
     Stranato was confused now, this bot seemed to die sad. First he wanted=
 to die, he should have been happy, but he seemed so sad to die, the knife =
had no affect, he froze to death. Stranato sighed, this was the part of his=
 job he hated. Stranato picked up Drazom's body and carried it back to the =
Radicon's wrecked ship, which served as their base. Stranato set Drazom's b=
ody on a table.

                      "Any way we can bring him back? We c=
an reprogram him to serve us." Stranato said.

                      "I don=
't think so, his spark looks to be extinguished, sorry poor fellow, we coul=
dn't save ya." Train Wreck said.

                      "I shouldn't have s=
tabbed him." Stranato said.

                      "It wasn't you who kille=
d him, he froze to death, just sorry he didn't make it." Train Wreck said.
=

                      "No, you don't understand, I tried to kill him, I'm =
no better than the cold! I don't understand why I did something like that, =
maybe it was the cold." Stranato said. He sighed.

                      "M=
aybe I'm just a son of a--"

                      "No, you are acting stup=
id now! Your murderer curcuits blocked out your intelligence circuits and y=
our logic circuits." Train Wreck said, interupting Stranato.

             =
         "I hope your right." Stranato said. Train Wreck looked at the body=
.

                      "We could always put a new spark in his body" Trai=
n Wreck said. Stranato sighed and sat in the corner.

                     =
 "We could have used him, and instead we let him die and didn't save him, a=
nd I tried to kill him myself." Stranato said.

                      OCC: =
Orchid, the Radicons could put a new spark from their spark collection (Fro=
m deathmatches!) into Drazom's body if you want to have a new character wit=
h Drazoms body, Orchid. Orchid, I could have them change the body and you c=
an bring in a new character without having him or her look like Drazom at a=
ll, your choice, you can just have them get rid of his body even, just pick=
 something, please...
                        ----- Original Message ----- =

                        From: ilovealllizards 
                        To:=
 nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                        Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 =
8:37 PM
                        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


             =
           *The knife hit Drazom's back. He didn't scream or anything. It w=
as already snowing which made him even colder. Mech fluid begins pouring ou=
t of his back* Drazom:............ *Drazom's head hits the ground. It wasn'=
t really the knife. It was coldness. Drazom's spark fades out and he lies t=
here......and mutters one word..* Drazom:....Mantella....... *Drazom's opti=
cs flicker and fade out* *He lived to love....he lived to die.....That was =
a queston that would never be answered*





                        (OOC: =
Please Drazom on the Deceased bots page. as that he died from the lack of e=
mch fluid and because of how cold it was)
                          ----- O=
riginal Message ----- 
                          From: THECODE 
           =
               To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                          Sent: Thur=
sday, June 29, 2000 6:54 PM
                          Subject: Re: Neo Beas=
t Wars


                          The Radicons had walked off and left Dra=
zom, but now they were walking back and they seen him again. Airbomber laug=
hed.

                          "There's the guy I saved, I wonder why he w=
ants to die?" Airbomber asked.

                          "I don't know, bu=
t I will oblige his needs!" Stranato said. Stranato walked up behind Drazom=
 slowly. Stranato pulled out a knife, something he had stolen from the Peop=
le's Base, and plunged it down, the knife screaming toward Drazom's back.

=
                          Stronghold and Blender took a sip of their beer.
=

                          "Why does that guy want to die, though?" Arrow a=
sked.

                          "Some bots are crazy." Train Wreck said, t=
he 5 Radicons watching Stranato...
                            ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
                            From: ilovealllizards 
      =
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                            S=
ent: Wednesday, June 28, 2000 7:01 PM
                            Subject: =
Re: Neo Beast Wars


                            *Drazom slowly turns his h=
ead and looks at The Radicons* Drazom:....no......I must...die for.....my s=
tupidity...of....messing up with......Mantella..... *Drazom's optics widen =
as he remembers something* Drazom:...hey....I'm a Pred.....I AM!.....kill m=
e........*Drazom pulls hisself up by a tree limb and mech fluid pours out o=
f his side and he falls back to the ground shivering from how cold it is ge=
tting from the lack of mech fluid*
                              ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
                              From: THECODE 
          =
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                              S=
ent: Tuesday, June 27, 2000 10:59 PM
                              Subject:=
 Neo Beast Wars


                              Train Wreck walked away fro=
m the battle, Plintissa and Stronghold run away. Stranato, not seeing any p=
oint in continuing the battle, ran off with them. Scamrock followed with a =
grunt from being outnumbered. Artist laughed and ran after them as well.

 =
                             "Know what my names gonna be now? I'm going to=
 be Blender!" Scamrock said.

                              "Who cares abou=
t you?" Stranato asked. Stronghold reached out to grab Stranato but he cart=
wheeled out of the way.

                              "We left that idiot =
Arrow in your CR Chamber, Plintissa." Stronghold said.

                   =
           "WHAT!?" Stranato yelled.

                              "It's m=
y base, and Arrow is welcome to be repaired there and so are the other form=
er Radicons!" Plintissa yelled.

                              The Radicons=
 nodded and walked on, Stranato grumbled out something that none of them, c=
ould understand. Airbomber seen them and waved to them. The People's Base's=
 secret passageway was in the nearby swamp.

                              =
"Get ready!" Train Wreck said to Airbomber.

                              =
"What about this guy?" Airbomber asked.

                              "Nev=
er mind him." Train Wreck said. Airbomber drug Drazom out of the water and =
ushered him to come along while he walked with his comrades.

             =
                 Dracona was getting furious, and so was Gangon.

         =
                     "Sorry Gangon, I did all I could, maybe BrightBlade wi=
ll still show up anyway." Dracona said. Gangon waited while Dracona flew aw=
ay.

                              "Hey! Wait! You forgot to untie meeeee!"=
 Gangon screamed.

                              Dracona didn't hear and la=
nded next to the People's Group members. The Radicons, Plintissa, Dracona, =
and Artist all entered the Poeple's base through the secret passage way, th=
e computer reconizing them as friends. Train Wreck and Airbomber stepped in=
to a door.

                              "Hey, Stranato, look at this! It'=
s amazing!" Train Wreck called out. Arrow steps out of the CR Chamber all h=
ealed up.

                              "Yeah, it's got lots of beer and c=
igars in here, too! and it's big enough to put a table in to play cards! Ho=
w come we never noticed this room before?" Airbomber said. Stranato walked =
into the room. Stronghold and Blender followed.

                          =
    "Wait up guys!" Arrow called out, running into the room. Plintissa seal=
ed the door magnetically upon order from Train Wreck, the Radicons were loc=
ked inside the room to sort out their problems. There was alot of banging, =
but it eventually stopped. Alot of name calling, too. Plintissa laughed and=
 sat down at a table to play cards with Dracona.

                         =
     "Oh, man! Not even a drop of beer in here! We'll dehydrate drinking wa=
ter!" Stronghold said.

                              "What are we going to=
 do? Nothing to smoke!" Blender said.

                              "I hav=
e more needs than all of you idiots put together! I'm getting fat and need =
to exercise!" Stranato yelled.

                              "How come we =
can't all get along! I don't like it in here neither!" Arrow said. Stranato=
 looked at him like he was going to kill him. Arrow cowered in the corner.
=

                              "You see? That's why you fail, Arrow, you do=
n't stand up against Stranato and his stupid rules! This was our idea!" Tra=
in Wreck yelled.

                              "Yeah, and nobody is gettin=
g out of here until we are all friends again." Airbomber said.

           =
                   Stranato sighed in disapointment. Arrow stood up again, =
and started pacing the room. Stronghold and Blender started to look in crac=
ks in the wall for something to drink, despite plenty of water in this room=
. Train Wreck was discussing something with Arrow and Airbomber, and Strong=
hold and Blender joined them before long.

                              "S=
ay, you guys, it's really lonely sitting here with nothing to do, and--"

 =
                             "Shut up and get your ass over here! Of course=
 you can join us!" Arrow said, cutting off Stranato. Stranato walks over an=
d sits with them. Stronghold pulls out a pack of playing cards.

          =
                    Plintissa and Dracona smile to each other and walk up a=
nd out of the secret passgeway, taking a walk across a field...
